snippet: Gov. Chris Christie appeared on New Jersey 101.5 FM on Monday to answer questions from callers.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column notes that New Jersey Gov Chris Christie took callers' questions about the George Washington Bridge scandal on the air at radio station 101.5 FM; says governor went into his default mode--talking a good political game but never really answering the challenges.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie appeared on New Jersey 101.5 FM on Monday to answer questions from callers.

headline.main: Knee-Deep in Traffic-Jam Scandal, Christie Keeps Talking
headline.print_headline: Knee-Deep in Traffic-Jam Scandal, Christie Keeps Talking
